name: Sandscan
description:
You are out in the desert looking for treasures that were left here from a long time ago when it was all sea. Scan to see where to look for the nearest spot, dig to get it.

Digging trips are limited to 30 seconds so you better not waste your time and car battery!

Tips:
- Control your car with WASD, dig with Spacebar and scan with R
- Treasures cannot be found at the spots you already dug at
- Red scan arrow shows you the furthest treasure instead of the closest one
- When you find a treasure, you get free instant scan, pay attention!
- Scan takes away 5 energy so you better use it only in desperate situations
